text: Hey ! Welcome to this Pre-Alpha. The chief asked for you, did you talked to him ?

dialog.text: Are you blind %T ? He's just next to Gurlgill few steps east of here !

choices.choice: What the hell is this game !?

dialog.text: Don't be this rude please. It's simple ! You're a Murloc, you have some Murloc friends here like me, and the goal is to get XP and PHAT LEWT. First, open your Spellbook and Drag&Drop spells in your 'ActionBar' at the bottom of your screen. The menu is on the bottom-left corner BTW. That's it, GL to survive, and enjoy.

choices.choice: Can I have the Mage spec please ?

dialog.text: How do you know this ?! Hmm, since this is only a Pre-Alpha and you cannot unlock it by any mean.. Well, I can cheat for you and give that mage spec if you really want it.
